data.author: Standard Business
data.description: Kenya's inflation rate dropped marginally to 7.9 per cent in June despite rise in food, and transport prices. Fuel prices, which went up yesterday, are set to exert more pressure to cost of living.

data.description: Cyberattacks on Kenyan businesses increased by 82 per cent according to a pan-African cyber security report released by Liquid C2, a business unit of Liquid Intelligent Technologies.

data.description: Why did it take so long for maize to get on the high table? One could be its association with low-class, read hustlers. Two is technology. Boiled maize and nduma are easy to prepare - just boil.
